fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Bleed a player, they are indirectly attacked in the second phase after this one. (3 use)
- Stalk a player, roleblock bleeding players visiting them, learn if you stopped any.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may multitask.
- If you bled a town member, any heals only delay the death by one day, it is cured fully otherwise.
- If the game number is even, this role becomes its <#970046125065265202> post counterpart.
